text: Apuni khan laga jibon laga niyom khan to Khrista laga susamachar logot milaikena thakibi, titia moi apuni khan logote thakile bhi nathakile bhi, moi apuni khan to biswas te bhal pora khara kori ase, aru ekjon-ekjon logote mili kene susamachar laga biswas nimite kaam kori ase koi kene moi hunibo nimite.
